name: Math Warrior
description:
Tailored for Gr 3-4, this game focuses on using math skills to save the kidnapped cousins. Ascend the tower meeting both allies and adversaries along the way. At the top resides the dreaded Troll.  Defeat the Troll using a combination of basic math skills and good old fashioned hack'n'slacks.  Math skills include

  • Multiplication and Division practice
  • Time telling to nearest 5 minutes as well as calculating elapsed time
  • Deciphering 4 digit codes using properties of those  numbers
  • Fully functional Mastermind game

Game length is approximately 60-90 minutes.
